attributes.action: nominate Fabio Capello for a knighthood if England win the 2010 world cup!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If Fabio Capello leads england to world cup glory, knight him and concrete his place as the greatest England manager of all time!

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
